option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# My Java Learning Projects
This repository contains various projects and code examples I wrote while learning the Java programming language.
## Project Structure
### 1. **abstractClasses** - Abstract Classes Applications for different categories (Woman, Man, Kids) using abstract classes and abstract methods in game calculations. - `GameCalculator.java` - Abstract base class - `WomanGameCalculator.java` - Woman category - `ManGameCalculator.java` - Man category - `KidsGameCalculator.java` - Kids category
### 2. **abstractDemo** - Abstract Database Management An abstract structure for different database systems (MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server). - `BaseDatabaseManager.java` - Base abstract class - `MySqlDatabaseManager.java` - MySQL implementation - `OracleDatabaseManager.java` - Oracle implementation - `sqlServerDatabaseManager.java` - SQL Server implementation - `CustomerManager.java` - Customer management
### 3. **accedModifies** - Access Modifiers Learning about Java access modifiers (public, private, protected). - `Car.java` - Example of access levels
### 4. **Employe** - Employee Class Basic object-oriented programming example. - `calisan.java` - Employee class
### 5. **Encapsulation** - Encapsulation Data hiding and controlled access principles. - `book.java` - Book class example
### 6. **for-each** - For-Each Loop Usage of for-each loop in Java.
### 7. **hataAyiklama** - Error Debugging Error management and debugging techniques.
### 8. **hesapMakinesi** - Calculator Simple calculator application. - `HesapMakinesi.java` - Calculations - `Main.java` - Main program
### 9. **inheritance-miras** - Inheritance Learning and implementing class inheritance. - `Person.java` - Base class - `Employee.java` - Employee class (inherits from Person) - `Customer.java` - Customer class (inherits from Person) - `PersonManager.java`, `EmployeeManager.java`, `CustomerManager.java` - Managers
### 10. **interface2** - Interface Example 2 Practical application of interface usage. - `ICalisan.java` - Employee interface - `Akademisyen.java` - Academician class
### 11. **interfaceDemo** - Interface Demo Different interface implementations. - `IEatable.java` - Eatable interface - `IPayable.java` - Payable interface - `IWorkable.java` - Workable interface - `Worker.java` - Worker - `Robot.java` - Robot - `OutsourceWorker.java` - Outsource worker
### 12. **interfaces** - Interface and Repository Pattern Repository pattern and data access layer. - `IRepository.java` - Base repository interface - `ICustomerDal.java` - Customer data access interface - `MySqlCustomerDal.java` - MySQL implementation - `OracleCustomerDal.java` - Oracle implementation - `CustomerManager.java` - Customer management
### 13. **javaDersleri2** - Java Lessons 2 Basic Java concepts. - `Ev.java` - House class - `Main.java` - Main program
### 14. **kalitim** - Inheritance Example Inheritance and class hierarchy. - `Calisan.java` - Base employee class - `OgretimUyesi.java` - Teaching staff - `Akademisyen.java` - Academician - `Asistan.java` - Assistant - `BilgiIslem.java` - IT personnel - `Guvenlik.java` - Security officer - `Memurlar.java` - Officers - `Main.java` - Main program
### 15. **MayinTarlasi** - Minesweeper Game Classic minesweeper game application.
### 16. **methodOverloading** - Method Overloading Methods with same name but different parameters.
### 17. **overriding** - Method Overriding Overriding methods from parent class.
### 18. **PolymorphismDemo** - Polymorphism Demo Implementation of polymorphism concept.
### 19. **SiniflarArasiIiskiler** - Relationships Between Classes Relationships between classes (composition, aggregation, etc.).
### 20. **Static** - Static Concept Static variables and methods.
### 21. **staticDemo** - Static Demo Practical examples of static usage.
### 22. **string** - String Operations String class and string methods.
### 23. **tahmin Oyunu** - Guessing Game Number guessing game application.
### 24. **class-E** - Class Exercises Class creation and usage exercises.
## Learned Concepts
- ✅ Class and Object - ✅ Access Modifiers - ✅ Encapsulation - ✅ Inheritance - ✅ Polymorphism - ✅ Abstract Classes - ✅ Interfaces - ✅ Method Overloading - ✅ Method Overriding - ✅ Static Concept - ✅ String Operations - ✅ Loops and Control Structures - ✅ Error Management
## ️ Technologies
- **Language:** Java - **IDE:** IntelliJ IDEA (IML files available) - **Version Control:** Git
## Usage
Each project is located in its own directory and can be run independently. You can run the `Main.java` file in the project directory to see the results.
### Example: ```bash cd abstractClasses javac src/*.java java -cp src Main ```
## Notes
These projects have played an important role in my Java learning process. Each project helped me understand one or more Java concepts in depth.
## License
These projects are for educational purposes.
---
**Last Updated:** 2025
